pli-tv-bi-vb-np11:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np11:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī bahussutā hoti bhāṇikā visāradā paṭṭā dhammiṃ kathaṃ kātuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np11:1.3: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo sītakāle mahagghaṃ kambalaṃ pārupitvā yena thullanandā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np11:1.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho rājānaṃ pasenadiṃ kosalaṃ thullanandā bhikkhunī dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np11:1.5: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṃsito thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np11:1.7: “Sace me tvaṃ, mahārāja, dātukāmosi, imaṃ kambalaṃ dehī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np11:1.8: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā kambalaṃ datvā uṭṭhāyāsanā thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np11:1.12: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np11:1.13: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np11:1.14: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā rājānaṃ kambalaṃ viññāpessatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-np11:1.15: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī rājānaṃ kambalaṃ viññāpetī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np11:1.18: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī rājānaṃ kambalaṃ viññāpessati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np11:1.20: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np11:1.21: “Garupāvuraṇaṃ pana bhikkhuniyā cetāpentiyā catukkaṃsaparamaṃ cetāpetabbaṃ. Tato ce uttari cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np11:2.1.10: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā ekabhikkhuniyā vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np11:2.1.13: “idaṃ me, ayye, garupāvuraṇaṃ atirekacatukkaṃsaparamaṃ cetāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ, imāhaṃ saṃghassa nissajjāmī”ti …pe…
